meanings.definition: A group of arthropods with numerous legs, including centipedes and millipedes.
meanings.sent1: I learned about myriapods in science class.
meanings.sent2: The myriapods crawled slowly across the forest floor.
meanings.sent3: The myriapods decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The myriapods in the garden were like a moving carpet of legs.
meanings.sent5: The myriapods with their many legs looked like tiny walking trains.
